p: Table 1 shows the result of the EO chemical composition of Lepechinia paniculata. In the leaves, 40 compounds were identified that represented 98.34% of the total composition on the DB-5MS chromatographic column and 98.40% of the total composition on the HP-INNOWax column. Similarly, in the EO of the flowers, 29 compounds were identified that represented 97.62% of the total composition on the DB-5MS column and 98.43% of the total composition on the HP-INNOWax column.
